topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553731b66368723c128c0000#post_553731b66368723c128c0000
Luffy's a Peace Maine. He doesn't care about treasure, fame, or power. He just wants the freedom of adventure and comradery that comes from sailing under a Jolly Roger. That's probably the biggest reason he's sailing to find the One Piece. Because it's the biggest adventure imaginable.  Hell Gol D. Roger and Edward Newgate were Peace Maines and they were regarded as the most powerful pirates of their era.
